name: ScrumGuideFactsfromTheSundayLunchProject
0:
”Alexa, ask Scrum Guide Facts for a scrum fact”
”Alexa, ask Scrum Guide Facts tell me about scrum”
”Alexa, ask Scrum Guide Facts whats in the scrum guide”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scrum guide facts
des:
The Scrum Guide Fact from The Sunday Lunch Project provides an additional tool for prospective Scrum Masters whilst preparing for their Scrum Master certification exams.

This is a derivative work by tw07four based on ScrumGuides.org. No endorsement is made by either Jeff Sutherland, Ken Schwaber, or any of their related commercial entities.
